actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    id,
    first_name,
    last_name,
    email,
    date_of_birth,
    address,
    phone,
    comment,
    CASE 
        WHEN status = 'BLACKLISTED' THEN 'Vulnerable'
        WHEN status = 'REJECTED' THEN 'Safe'
        WHEN status = 'PENDING' THEN 'Critical'
        WHEN status = 'VERIFIED' THEN 'Endangered'
        ELSE status
    END AS status
FROM kyc
ORDER BY id ASC;
